QuestData.Title: Hippogryph Soul
QuestData.Description: <The Hippogryph Soul is intelligent and valiant. The shape of the hippogryph will be yours to call upon.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Hippogryph Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Hippogryph Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
